question: What is Terralogic Academy?
answer: Terralogic Academy is a 6-month hands-on training program in front-end development designed to prepare aspiring developers for industry challenges.

question: Why should I join Terralogic Academy?
answer: ● Training on real-time problem statements and projects. ● Opportunity to implement best practices as per industry standards. ● Complex problem-solving guidance ● Internship at Terralogic for two months to improve front-end developer skills on live projects.

question: What makes Terralogic Academy unique?
answer: ● Training on real-world problem statements and industry projects. ● Hands-on internship to enhance front-end developer skills. ● Guidance on complex problem-solving and industry best practices.

question: Is it an online program?
answer: No, all classes will be held in person. We believe face-to-face interaction with peers and mentors is essential for exchanging perspectives.

question: What is the duration of the course?
answer: The duration of this front-end development course in Nellore is 6 months, in which there will be 4 months of hands-on practical training and 2 months of front-end development internship at Terralogic.

question: Is it a full-time program?
answer: Weekend in-person classes of around 6 hours are scheduled to accommodate college students. However, we recommend dedicating 2 hours each day during the week to keep up with the learning schedule. 7.

question: What is the total fee for the course?
answer: The fee for the 6-month Front-End Developer course is INR 92,000.

question: Are final-year students eligible?
answer: Yes, final-year students of relevant fields can join.

question: What are the eligibility criteria?
answer: ● You should be a graduate of BTech or postgraduate in computer science. ● You should be ready for an internship of 2 months. ● If you are a working professional, you should have an overall experience of less than 1 year in the IT industry. ● Tech enthusiast of other industries/domains looking for a career change and has less than 1 year experience in the IT industry.

question: Is the internship mandatory?
answer: The internship at Terralogic Academy plays a crucial role in preparing you for the industry. We recommend completing it, as it allows us to evaluate your ability to apply what you've learned and provide targeted feedback for improvement. Your final assessment report will be withheld on not completing the internship.

question: Do I need prior coding experience to join?
answer: No prior experience is necessary. Our courses are designed to cater to beginners as well as those with some coding background. Preferably, students can learn front-end development who have completed college.

question: How are candidates selected?
answer: Selection is based on the applicant’s educational background and career interest in front-end development.

question: What kind of certification will I receive?
answer: A certification of completion will be awarded after finishing the program and internship.

question: Is there a project-based learning approach?
answer: Yes, you’ll work on real-time problem statements and projects to build practical skills.

question: What types of projects will I work on during the internship?
answer: You’ll work on live front-end development projects at Terralogic, following industry standards.

question: Is there a minimum attendance requirement?
answer: Yes, maintaining regular attendance is mandatory to complete the course successfully.

question: What happens if I miss a class?
answer: Missed classes can be covered by reviewing the provided materials and seeking mentor guidance.

question: How many students will be in each class?
answer: Class sizes are kept small to ensure personalized attention.

question: How do I get feedback on my portfolio?
answer: Mentors provide constructive feedback during training and internship reviews.

question: What career opportunities are available after the course?
answer: Front-End Web Developer, JavaScript Developer, Mobile App Developer.

question: How does the program prepare students for industry challenges?
answer: It focuses on practical, hands-on training, live project exposure, and problem-solving.

question: What can you expect as the outcome of the course?
answer: Our 6-month program is designed to help you gain both technical and soft skills, with personalized guidance from mentors at every step. The curriculum is structured to build essential knowledge while also giving you insight into industry standards. After 4 months of training, you'll be ready to shadow, analyze, and work on live projects. The final 2-month front-end internship allows you to put your skills into practice in real-world situations.

question: Will I get a job guarantee?
answer: No, you will be trained for 4 months and complete a 2-month internship at Terralogic, which will make you industry-ready.

question: Can I pursue freelance work while enrolled?
answer: Yes, as long as it doesn’t interfere with your course commitments.

question: Is there a money-back policy?
answer: No, there’s no money-back policy once enrolled.

question: How can I balance this program with personal commitments?
answer: Weekend classes and flexible self-study schedules make it manageable alongside other commitments.

question: What if I want to specialize in a particular area after the program?
answer: This course focuses on front-end development; specialization would require additional learning.

question: Are other courses offered?
answer: Yes, Terralogic Academy plans to introduce other tech-focused courses soon.

question: What support is available to students during the program?
answer: You’ll have access to mentors, resources, and project reviews to ensure learning success.

question: What if I have more questions?
answer: Reach out to us at academy@terralogic.com.

question: Why choose Terralogic Academy for front-end development?
answer: At Terralogic Academy, you’ll work on real-world projects, gaining experience directly from a company involved in live development.

question: Where is the location?
answer: The academy is located at Nellore and has a well-equipped training facility.

question: What topics are covered in the course?
answer: You’ll learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and advanced frameworks like React and Angular, paired with practical project experience.

question: Who are the mentors?
answer: Satyanarayana Murthy: Director of Engineering with 14 years of experience in PHP, NodeJs, Angular, and more. Sudheer Kumar: Senior Architect skilled in crafting web applications across various industries.

question: Where can I find the course curriculum?
answer: The curriculum PDF is available on our website.

question: Have the classes started?
answer: Yes, they have started. Contact us now to be part of the next batch!

question: What is this course all about?
answer: To get a detailed overview of the course, watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ax8jviflbo
